channel.title: Fail Server Crasher
channel.description:
Basically I Ip Banned someone today on my server and they didnt take to kindly however im not to sure that its them. the ip from the connection is different to several of the person i ipbanned. basically every 5mins or so i get a connection from this person ive tried unipbanning to see if he logs in, and even changing my source to see if he logs in. Im not to flusterd about at the moment but it couldnt eventually be a problem as the server becomes more populated is there any way to stop this person from doing this without resorting to retaliating back.
[img]http://img44.imageshack.us/img44/7743/failhacker.jpg[/img]

item.title: Fail Server Crasher
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

After connection receved it leaves a null.
Doesnt say its connected

Read full topic

item.title: Fail Server Crasher
item.dc:creator: @xxlukexx xxlukexx
item.description:
@xxlukexx wrote:

[quote=“djdoyle1, post:11, topic:318134”] if(playerName == null || playerName == "null") { PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null"; PlayerHandler.kickNick = null; disconnected = true; }
^^
Process method[/quote]

and why do you think that will work if he can actually login?

edit: nathan, add his ip in the ip ban list.

Read full topic

item.title: Fail Server Crasher
item.dc:creator: @djdoyle1 djdoyle1
item.description:
@djdoyle1 wrote:

if(playerName == null || playerName == "null") {
PlayerHandler.kickNick = "null";
PlayerHandler.kickNick = null;
disconnected = true;
}

^^
Process method

item.title: Fail Server Crasher
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

A big fail indeed.
When you registered your server on the server status list, it told you not to ban a certain IP.
Did’nt you read all of that crap?
